Guillaume Barnier

Geophysicist / Machine Learning Scientist

GitHub eg-optimzation Linkedin

Welcome to my website! My name is Guillaume Barnier, I am a Ph.D candidate in the Stanford Exploration Project (SEP) research group within the Department of Geophysics at Stanford University. I focus on developing new algorithms to create accurate maps of the Earth's subsurface using sound waves.

I am also passionate about Machine Learning, and more specifically Reinforcement Learning.
